title: Doubt
content: Is it possible to get MRD with 9.5 SGPA for the first sem??

comments.body: It also depends on campus(ec or rr).. last year apparently it was 9.6 for RR chem cycle..
Ya bro even i had a similar doubt , like what would be the cutoff for phy cycle rr campus
Well then you have to wait till they announce the list.
I thought it was an email intimation.. So does the list contains all the names of the scholarship winners?
Yes, for first year atleast we got the "list" of people securing scholarships, but this year we were just sent mails personally
You'll get a scholarship for the next sem.
